com.coronis.frames
Class CoronisFrame

java.lang.Object
  com.coronis.frames.CoronisFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
ACKFrame, ErrorFrame, NAKFrame, ReceivedBroadcastResponseFrame, ReceivedFrame, ReceivedMultiFrame, ReqSendBroadcastFrame, ReqWriteParameterFrame, ResReadParameterFrame, ResRemoteRSSIFrame, ResSendFrame, ResWriteParameterFrame, TransmissionErrorFrame, WavePortFirmwareFrame
public class CoronisFrame
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for all the Coronis frames

 int getMessageLength()
          Returns the message length Length of the message is - 1 byte for the SYNC - 1 byte for the STX - 1 byte for the LENGTH, - 1 byte for the CMD - N bytes for the DATA - 2 bytes for the CRC - 1 byte for the ETX
 boolean isACK()
          It this frame an ACK frame ?
 boolean mustACK()
          Do we have to ACK this frame ? Default is no ! Should be overloaded in children classes if needing an ACK

Constructor Detail

CoronisFrame

public CoronisFrame(int command,
                    int[] message)
CoronisFrame constructor. Builds up a CoronisFrame object from the CMD, DATA and CRC par of a Coronis frame description

Parameters:
command - CMD part of the Coronis frame
message - DATA + CRC part of the Coronis frame
Method Detail

checkCrc

public boolean checkCrc(int crcval)
Check CRC by comparing the computed one to crcval.

Parameters:
crcval -
Returns:
true if identical, false otherwise

getCrc

public int getCrc()
Returns the computed CRC on the data object. !! This is not the received CRC (but it should be the same ;-) ).

Returns:

getFrame

public int[] getFrame()
Returns an int[] formatted as valid Coronis frame to be sent to the WavePort

Returns:

getBinaryMessage

public int[] getBinaryMessage()
Returns the data part of the frame

Returns:
an int[] with the data part of the frame

getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage()
Returns the frame as human readable string FIXME : incoherent method name !

Returns:
the human readable String version of the frame

getByteArray

public byte[] getByteArray()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Returns the frame as a byte array valid to push into an OutputStream

Returns:
a valid byte array Coronis frame
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getMessageLength

public int getMessageLength()
Returns the message length Length of the message is - 1 byte for the SYNC - 1 byte for the STX - 1 byte for the LENGTH, - 1 byte for the CMD - N bytes for the DATA - 2 bytes for the CRC - 1 byte for the ETX

Returns:
the message length

isACK

public boolean isACK()
It this frame an ACK frame ?

Returns:
true if it is an ACK frame, false otherwise

mustACK

public boolean mustACK()
Do we have to ACK this frame ? Default is no ! Should be overloaded in children classes if needing an ACK

Returns:
true if frame needs to be ACK'ed, false otherwise

getCmd

public int getCmd()
CMD getter

Returns:
int CMD
